name: survivor
description: A resourceful individual who has learned to adapt and endure in the post-divine world.
flavor_text: When the heavens fell, you were already living on the margins. Street smarts and raw determination kept you alive through the chaos. You know how to find food, shelter, and allies in the wasteland that used to be civilization.

background_skills.name: Urban Survival
background_skills.description: Knowledge of finding resources in ruins and wasteland

background_skills.name: Danger Sense
background_skills.description: Instinct for avoiding trouble and detecting threats
background_skills.mechanical_effect: +1 to initiative, chance to detect ambushes

investigation: I've seen things like this before.
Check the shadows - that's where truth hides.
People lie, but their surroundings don't.
social: We stick together or we die alone.
I know where to find what you need.
combat: I'll use whatever I can find.
You picked the wrong survivor to mess with.
